major: Computational chemistry project, focusing on simulation of polymer membranes and improving current methods to predict desalination. I am also trying to find materials that may offer increased performance at a lower cost and possible biopolymers that perform the same function. Machine learning will be incorporated. Part of a collaboration between A. Prof. Katya Pas at Monash and Prof. Benny Freeman at the University of Texas at Austin.

Chemistry with an emphasis on physical chemistry and polymer science. Masters project undertaken with Prof. Stefan Bon, involving the sythesis and characterisation of supramolecular functional low molecular weight polyTHF. Rheological testing was performed.
